<MethodEndpoint

Update a collaboration space by ID. Allowed if the client owns the space.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"spaceId","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"The ID of the collaboration space to update."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
